publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2291# Patricia Ferguson: Conference of Women Parliamentarians held in the Chamber, 28 and 29 September 2001—That the Parliament notes the conference of women parliamentarians held in the chamber on 28 and 29 September 2001; congratulates the National Democratic Institute and the Vital Voices Global Partnership for its initiative in bringing together women parliamentarians in this way; further notes that this was the first time women parliamentarians from Oireachtas Eireann, Westminster, the Northern Ireland Assembly, the National Assembly for Wales and the Scottish Parliament have had the opportunity to come together to discuss issues of interest to them, and agrees to the importance of building on the good progress made at the conference in addressing the issue of gender inequality.

S1M-2291# Conference of Women Parliamentarians held in the Chamber, 28 and 29 September 2001 (lodged on 3 October 2001) Karen Whitefield*, Marilyn Livingstone*, Tommy Sheridan*, Mr Kenneth Macintosh*, Brian Fitzpatrick*, Trish Godman*
S1M-2291# Conference of Women Parliamentarians held in the Chamber, 28 and 29 September 2001 (lodged on 3 October 2001) Mrs Mary Mulligan*, Johann Lamont*, Linda Fabiani*
S1M-2291# Conference of Women Parliamentarians held in the Chamber, 28 and 29 September 2001 (lodged on 3 October 2001) Michael Russell*
S1M-2291# Conference of Women Parliamentarians held in the Chamber, 28 and 29 September 2001 (lodged on 3 October 2001) Donald Gorrie*
S1M-2291# Conference of Women Parliamentarians held in the Chamber, 28 and 29 September 2001 (lodged on 3 October 2001) Shona Robison*
S1M-2291# Conference of Women Parliamentarians held in the Chamber, 28 and 29 September 2001 (lodged on 3 October 2001) Pauline McNeill*
S1M-2291# Conference of Women Parliamentarians held in the Chamber, 28 and 29 September 2001 (lodged on 3 October 2001) Elaine Smith*
S1M-2291# Conference of Women Parliamentarians held in the Chamber, 28 and 29 September 2001 (lodged on 3 October 2001) Cathy Peattie*
S1M-2291# Conference of Women Parliamentarians held in the Chamber, 28 and 29 September 2001 (lodged on 3 October 2001) Rhoda Grant*
S1M-2291# Conference of Women Parliamentarians held in the Chamber, 28 and 29 September 2001 (lodged on 3 October 2001) Bill Butler*
